name: Rhino Rhodeo
description:
This is a 48 hour jam entry for the GMTK 2020 game jam!

I didn't get all the levels and polish in that I wanted, and I wanted to add a VR mode too which I may do post-jam, but it's fairly playable.

Be prepared to be frustrated, the theme was "Out of control"!

Your goal is to steer the rhino into the cage with the least possible environment damage.

Good luck!

Controls are just A and D for steering, holding both slows it down a tiny bit, if you're lucky.

Mouse 1/2 also steer, so you can technically play this with just a mouse if you wanted to.

Linux and OSX builds are untested.
